Usage: $0 install <platform>

Description:

  Installs the application to a specific platform.

  When there is nothing to install, the command will fail.

  Automatically detects support for the platform SDK and executes the
  install command locally or remotely.

Examples:

  $ $0 install android
  $ $0 install ios

Also see:

  $0 local install <platform>
  $0 remote install <platform>
